article_title: Political newcomer from Berkeley Springs goes all in for U.S. House seat
article_text:
Thank you for reading HeraldMailMedia.com free articles on our site. og.description: SPRING MILLS, W.Va. — Ken Reed, a local businessman who owns a chain of seven pharmacies in four states, has jumped into the high waters of the 2nd Congressional District primary election for the seat being vacated by U.S. Rep. Shelley Moore Capito.
